description: This Java source file defines the class 'MockCPEHal' which provides static methods to simulate or set hardware-related properties such as tampering, battery status, and power conditions via property settings. The class primarily interacts with the PropsHelper utility to set properties corresponding to different hardware states.

classes.name: MockCPEHal
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to set mock hardware status properties for CPE devices.

methods.name: setTamper
methods.description: Sets the tamper property of the device to true or false.

methods.name: setBadBattery
methods.description: Sets the bad battery status property.

methods.name: setLowBattery
methods.description: Sets the low battery status property.

methods.name: setMissingBattery
methods.description: Sets the missing battery status property.

methods.name: setAcPowerRemoved
methods.description: Sets the AC power removed status property.
